column3: Latest;Siem Reap: An American man without a valid passport/visa was taken in by police after he was seen begging in Siem Reap at 9:00 am
column6: 58 had been asking for money for food from international tourists around the Old Market.------He said he arrived in December 2019
column7: and had given his passport to a Cambodian woman
column8: but doesn’t know where she went with it.------He was sent to Siem Reap eviction office to proceed with the law. MCPN
